name: Map18xx
tagline: ClojureScript/om.next based 18xx map with track editor
body:
### Populate 18xx maps with track
Just click and drag to lay track, upgrades happen automagically.
If you mess up, click undo as needed to restore order.

## Todo:
- Have different base maps
- Get offboards and city names/values implemented'
- Add stations
- More tiles
- Descriptive tile format for auto-placing stations during upgrades.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
